name: Recent Post Scroll Widget
author: Quazi Sazzad

sections.description:
Recent Post Scroll Widget is very customizable post widget . There are a lot’s of option to display your recent post .

Here some of option list

General option

  • Title
  • Title Icon
  • Query Number Of post:
  • Post Type:
  • Display : Title or Content
  • Shown number of content word:

Styling option

  • header Color
  • Header font size
  • Title/Content Color
  • Title/Content font size:
  • Read more Color
  • Read more font size:

Scrolling option

  • Shown number of post on scrollbar:
  • Auto scrolling:
  • Stop scrolling on hoverr
  • Scroll on:
  • Direction icon:
  • Scrolling Speed in mili second:
 Need Support ? Contact Us
sections.installation:
Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

Now Go to Appearance->Widget and set Recent Post Scroll Widget to any widget to display recent post smoothly
